data.name: First Time in Rome
data.detailed_description:
You May Also Like

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1823330/Faircrofts_Antiques_The_Mountaineers_Legacy/

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1895640/I_Love_Finding_Critters/

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1767190/Threaded/


About the Game

Kate Robinson's Hidden Object adventure continues! When work takes the amateur travel blogger and her daughter to Rome, the pair must work hradern than ever to discover what actually makes this historic city so beautiful!

Explore intricately-designed Hidden Object locations!
Help Kate make Bellissima Roma Great again!
Uncover Rome's true beauty through over 30 different minigames!
Replay beautiful locations in Unlimited Mode!
Unlock achievements by playing through the game!
Comes with downloadable wallpapers and the full soundtrack!

data.short_description: Travel blogger Kate Robinson and her daughter Nicole are headed to Rome for a big job with a local tourism agency!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2, Windows Vista SP1 or Windows 7/8/10 (Windows Update Recommended)
  • Processor: 1GHz or Faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 8.1 Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2, Windows Vista SP1 or Windows 7/8/10 (Windows Update Recommended)
  • Processor: 2Ghz i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 8.1 Compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.13 and above
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo, 64-bit 2Ghz i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.13 and above
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo, 64-bit 2Ghz i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
